sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Thousands of Serbian fans gathered in front of the iconic balcony of the old palace in Belgrade as local favorite Novak Djokovic received a hero's welcome following his recent US Open triumph. Fresh from a straight sets win over Daniil Medvedev in the final in New York, the 36-year-old who was invited to the stage by the Serbian basketball team gave a speech and struggled to hold back the tears. Djokovic's 24th Grand Slam title saw him reclaim the world number one spot whilst the basketball team produced a stunning run to reach the World Cup final held in Manila on Sunday.
